channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-6884] HiveLockObject and enclosed HiveLockObjectData override equal() method but didn't do so for hashcode()
item.description: This breaches the JAVA contact that equal objects should have equal hash code, thus may cause unexpected results.
item.summary: HiveLockObject and enclosed HiveLockObjectData override equal() method but didn't do so for hashcode()

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
